entry.title: FilipsMasolovs/note-mark: NoteMark is a lightweight, mobile-first markdown note-taking app built with Next.js, React, and Zustand. It features real-time preview, autosave, and intuitive note management with customizable themes. Designed for desktop and mobile, NoteMark lets you effortlessly capture ideas and format notes.
entry.content: NoteMark is a lightweight, mobile-first markdown note-taking app built with Next.js, React, and Zustand. It features real-time preview, autosave, and intuitive note management with customizable themes. Designed for desktop and mobile, NoteMark lets you effortlessly capture ideas and format notes.

entry.content: Mejiro is a lightweight web viewer with a strong focus on bookmark management.

entry.title: TarekRaafat/eleva: A minimalist, lightweight, pure vanilla JavaScript frontend runtime framework.
entry.content: A minimalist, lightweight, pure vanilla JavaScript frontend runtime framework.

entry.title: meet447/axiomai: AxiomAI is a modern, lightweight AI chat application that provides instant access to advanced language models without requiring any sign-up or authentication. Experience seamless conversations with state-of-the-art AI models in a beautiful, responsive interface.

entry.title: tim-rayner/react-esign: react-scribble is a lightweight, dependency free React component built for capturing handwritten signatures. It provides a simple and responsive signature pad, perfect for e-signatures, form authentication, or user confirmations in React applications
entry.content: react-scribble is a lightweight, dependency free React component built for capturing handwritten signatures. It provides a simple and responsive signature pad, perfect for e-signatures, form authentication, or user confirmations in React applications

entry.title: react18-tools/react-webgl-trails: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.

entry.title: faridmth/use-konva-snapping: A lightweight React hook for adding snapping functionality to Konva.js elements. It enables elements to snap to stage borders, the center of the stage, and other shapes, with customizable guidelines and snapping sensitivity.
entry.content: A lightweight React hook for adding snapping functionality to Konva.js elements. It enables elements to snap to stage borders, the center of the stage, and other shapes, with customizable guidelines and snapping sensitivity.

entry.title: bwlange/sym-pick: Sym-Pick is a lightweight and efficient VS Code extension that makes inserting Unicode symbols effortless. It provides a searchable list of symbols and emojis that can be inserted into your code with a single click.

entry.title: pardnchiu/QuickUI: QuickUI is a lightweight frontend framework built on vanilla JavaScript and native APIs. Supports data binding, i18n support, event binding, conditional rendering, and loop rendering.
